Das Bundesamt für Sport BASPO fördert auf Bundesebene den Sport und die Bewegung in der Schweiz und deren positive, nützliche und notwendige Rolle in der Gesellschaft. J+S ist das grösste Sportförderungsprogramm des Bundes. J+S-Kurse und Lager sind offen für alle Kinder und Jugendliche im Alter zwischen 5 und 20 Jahren an. In der Kaderbildung werden J+S-Leiterinnen und -Leiter, J+S-Expertinnen und -Experten sowie J+S-Coaches aus- und weitergebildet. Rund CHF 100 Mio. werden von J+S als Subventionen an Vereine, Nationale Sport- und Jugendverbände, Schulen, Kantone und weitere Partner ausbezahlt. In der Umsetzung, Weiterentwicklung und Kontrolle des Programms J+S wird das BASPO von den Kantonen und Verbänden unterstützt. 
Zur Verwaltung und Abwicklung sämtlicher J+S-Kurse und J+S-Lager sowie der J+S-Subventionen wird die «Nationale Datenbank für Sport» (NDS) verwendet. In dieser Applikation werden jährlich über 940'000 Teilnahmen von Kindern und Jugendlichen an J+S-Kursen und -Lagern verwaltet. Die NDS verzeichnet heute gegen 100'000 Zugriffe pro Monat.
Mit der NDS-App können Sie als J+S-Leiterin oder -Leiter einen reduzierten Funktionsumfang der Webapplikation auf Ihrem Smartphone nutzen. Die wichtigsten Funktionalitäten der NDS-App sind: 
-	Übersicht der offenen Anwesenheitskontrollen
-	Anwesenheitskontrolle der J+S-Kurse und -Lager führen
-	J+S-Aktivitäten (z. B. Training) erfassen, bearbeiten und löschen
-	J+S-Kurse und -Lager einsehen und bearbeiten
-	Personen den J+S-Kursen und -Lagern hinzufügen oder entfernen
-	App-Einstellungen verwalten (z. B. Sprache, Dark Mode, biometrisches Login)

Die NDS-App wird regelmässig weiterentwickelt und verbessert.

Weitere Features und Highlights
Beteiligt euch in unserer sehr aktiven Fußball Community in unterschiedlichsten Foren, wie z.B. der Gerüchteküche, Marktwertanalyse, den Vereinsforen und dem Trainerkarussell. Tretet in unserem Tipp- und Managerspiel gegen andere Fußball Fans, Experten und eure Freunde an. Listet alle eure Live Erlebnisse mit unserem Groundhopping Tool auf und seht, wer noch bei diesen Partien dabei war.


Findet immer wieder News in der größten frei zugänglichen Fußball-Datenbank der Welt mit mehr als 1 Mio. Partien, 1.000 Wettbewerben und 1.000.000 Spieler-Profilen.

Der Schweizer Langlaufpass ist das einzigartige Angebot, bei welchem der Käufer mit wenig Geld, sehr viel Leistung erhält. Loipen Schweiz und Romandie Ski de Fond preisen mit ihren rund 160 verschiedenen Loipenorganisationen das wohl umfassendste Sportangebot feil. Flächendeckend über alle Landesteile ziehen sich rund 5500 Kilometer Langlaufloipen durch die Wälder und Auen. Liebevoll, aufwendig und professionell aufbereitet von zig-tausend Helfern. Dieses hohe Mass an Qualität wollen wir hochhalten und mit dem Verkauf der „Langlauf-Saisonkarte“ - dem Schweizer Langlaufpass – abgelten.

In addition to the official game schedule, table and game center, the app offers more than 40 live statistics for all games of the championship. Download now and win the championship with your dream team!

**General**
In the Topscorers app, users compete against each other in a league by putting together the most competitive ice hockey team possible from current National League professionals with a set budget. In each league, each hockey player exists only once. Before a game day, each user puts together his team from the players available to him. The sum of the points collected in real time for each player results in the total number of points for his team per game day. The users play to win the regular season (qualifier) and the playoffs (champion).

**Live points**
The game principle of Topscorers is based on real events in the National League. On each National League game day you get points for the game actions of your lined up hockey players. These refer to the statistically recorded (live) performance data of the National League.

**Create a league**
Create your own league and invite your friends against whom you want to play the season. In one league 1-14 users can play.

**Game mode**
At the beginning of your Topscorers season you will be assigned a 20-player team worth CHF 3 million. The line-up is automatically generated from these 20 players and can be customized. In addition, you will receive a budget of CHF 1 million to make transfers. On the transfer market you can buy new players or sell players from your squad. But be careful, you must not have a negative account balance before the start of the game, otherwise you will not get any points for the whole game day.

Track your Dart Games, view Statistics, Create Tournaments and Play Online against other players. All for free and automatically synchronized across all platforms.

TRACK DARTS GAMES
Track your darts games in the scoreboard in 6+ different game modes. Currently there is an extensive X01 game mode, as well as Cricket, Around the Clock, Shanghai, Elimination and Highscore. More game modes will be added all the time. For each game mode you have configuration options.
You can also customize the scoreboard, for example, you can choose the input method between "Whole round" and "Each dart individually".

VIEW STATISTICS
View extensive statistics about your dart games. There are many statistics for all game modes, which you can view both as a table and as a graph. In order not to lose the overview you can choose which statistics you want to see and which not.

ORGANIZE TOURNAMENTS
In tournament mode you can organize a league or knockout tournament with many people. A tournament schedule with a game list is automatically calculated and you can play the games one after the other. At any time you can see the current standings or who made it to the finals.

PLAY ONLINE AGAINST OTHERS
In the revamped online section, you can add your friends in the friends system and invite them to online matches. In addition, you can also create open lobbies and search for an opponent in the chat.
You can chat in the online area itself, in the lobby as well as during and after the game.
In the lobby and in the profiles of your opponents, you can see their abandonment rate and their usual average to decide if you want to enter the match.

SYNCHRONIZED ACROSS ALL PLATFORMS
Pro Darts is available on all platforms. If you use cloud players, your data is automatically synchronized on all your devices. So you won't lose stats and you'll be up to date on every device.

COMPETE AGAINST COMPUTERS
If you don't have a real opponent with you, you can train against computer opponents. Ten different difficulty levels are available. You can also add computer opponents in tournaments.

Whympr is the mountain community app that accompanies mountain and outdoor sports enthusiasts (hiking, climbing, trail running, mountain biking, ski touring, snowshoeing, mountaineering…) BEFORE, DURING and AFTER their outings.

BEFORE YOUR OUTING 

- Discover more than 300,000 routes all over the world, in the mountains or anywhere else, from sources such as Skitour, Camptocamp and Tourist Offices
- Filter by activity, level of difficulty, point of interest, to find the outing that suits you the best
- Get inspiration and check recent conditions: more than 150,000 users are on Whympr sharing their outings 
- Access topographic maps, including IGN, SwissTopo and slope inclination
- Download your itinerary to view it offline
- Buy Pro Topos: routes created and illustrated by professionals and mountain guides, with activities including climbing, ski touring, mountaineering and hiking 
- Access detailed weather forecasts and check avalanche bulletins for your location or the area you're targeting
- Find out how to get to the start of the route (check if there is parking or if you can get there by public transport for a more eco-friendly outing)
- Avoid protected areas to preserve sensitive plants and wildlife by activating the "sensitive area" visual layer

DURING YOUR OUTING

- Geolocate yourself on the map of your choice
- Record your GPS tracks and view your outing statistics (distance, time, elevation, etc.)
- Add your photos:  these will be geolocated on the map and overlaid on your outing track
- Describe your outing (conditions, challenges encountered, gorgeous hidden places you found…)
- Share your outing with the Whympr community and on your social media

AFTER YOUR OUTING

- View your outing and retain a memory from your adventure
- Access your profile to view all of your recent activities on a map
- View the dashboard of your complete outing statistics
- Become a valuable member of a community of amazing mountain and outdoor enthusiasts

Whympr uses a freemium model. You can download the basic app on your iPhone for free and test the premium version for free for 7 days.
Beyond that, you can buy an annual subscription (€24.99/year) to benefit from Premium features:

Premium:
- Many base maps including IGN France and SwissTopo
- Offline mode
- Advanced route filter
- Detailed weather conditions
- GPS track recording
- GPX import
- Save your favorite areas to quickly access local weather forecast and avalanche report

What our customers say about us:

“What I like the most is that I can always find a point of interest per level. It's really tailor-made, I can't get lost in places that aren't for me. And that, whether it's for trail running, ski touring, climbing... It really matches my needs.”

"Whympr looks like a dematerialised mountain notebook. I can write down my outings, put photos, draw my route, add comments on the route and the conditions… I love sharing my outings in nature with a community of outdoor lovers. Also I can get inspired by their outings, which is great. And above all, I can see what their outings conditions have been, which is so important for me!”

In the press :

20 minutes: " Hiking is no longer perceived as a uncool thing. Apps are an easy gateway to nature activities now. They revolutionize the mountain and outdoor world and Whympr is one of them".

Le Parisien: " The ambition of Whympr is to bring every information we need for an outing, all in one place. This saves time and gives reliable information. It did not exist on the market until now".

Whympr is an official partner of E.N.S.A, the National School of Skiing and Mountaineering and of SNAM, the National Union of Mountain Leaders.

Whympr donates 1% of its turnover to 1% for the Planet to help preserve the environment.

MADE IN CHAMONIX

All of Silvretta Montafon in one app.

Welcome to the world of Silvretta Montafon – let’s go! 
The SiMo app is your digital guide on the mountain, your trusty companion for every adventure. Stay up to speed, never miss a thing, call up live info, book tickets, connect with friends, record activities, collect and redeem points and make the most of the numerous benefits!
So, why download the Silvretta Montafon app?

The app’s major functions at a glance:

-SHOP: 
Plan your day trips or book your entire holiday from the comfort of your own home: from accommodation, to lift passes and sports equipment, and fascinating experiences in the Silvretta Montafon alpine sports resort. 
And for last-minute travelers, the app allows you to book your lift pass with ease while en route to the mountains, and offers contactless printing at a PICK UP STATION, without having to go to a cash desk. 
Gift idea: The coolest print@home vouchers are available to purchase as gifts in the SiMo shop

-LIVE: 
All the latest info at a glance. Quickly check the weather, snow depth and facility opening times first thing in the morning. A glance at the webcams is enough to build your anticipation and give you even more holiday time: by using the app, you can see which lifts have no queues so you can hop right on!
Are you one of our lucky visitors spending several days in the Montafon mountains? Then the app is ideal for you, with its 10-day schedule of all the events and mountain experiences taking place. Boredom just doesn’t exist in Silvretta Montafon!

-ON SITE: 
Navigate to your preferred valley station and search for parking spaces. Up on the mountain, you’re spoiled for choice: Want to be the first to test the latest sports equipment from Intersport, book a lesson at the Ski school or Freeride station or sit back and enjoy a tasty cappuccino? ON SITE can’t make the decision for you, but it can show you in real time which shops and restaurants are open and where to find just what you’re looking for. You will also find all manner of useful and interesting information here for your stay in the valley.

-TIPS: 
Be as informed as the locals! Here, you can discover unmissable events and activities and gain in-depth insights into the world of Silvretta Montafon. And you’ll soon realize that Silvretta Montafon is a place to visit time and again, as there’s always something new to discover!

-DROP IN:
Your entry to the adventure playground that is Silvretta Montafon. Track your summit ascents, your mountain bike rides or your ski day on our 140 km of pistes. Connect with friends and battle for the top ranking. Who will cover the most kilometers on the pistes, who will climb the highest mountain? Collect pins and badges along the way, receive loyalty points and exchange them for vouchers in the app.
So get started: download the SiMo app and get going!

The IFF is introducing the new official IFF mobile app! The app gives you everything to do with international floorball, through results, live feeds, photos, video highlights and live-streaming. The APP of Dolomiti Superski is supposed to be a real online ski guide for those who want to discover the world’s largest ski carousel and is supported by all the operating systems of the most common smart phones. It has new graphics and a modern navigation: horizontal movements (swipe) allow users to switch from one of the 12 ski areas of Dolomiti Superski to the next in numerical order, while vertical movements (scroll) lead to various menu options, functions and services within the chosen ski area. If the GPS function of the device is activated, when the APP is launched, the system will lead to a contents page for the Dolomiti Superski ski area in which the user is located. One can login through the "MyDolomiti" community, after having registered (free of charge) to use the services. The APP offers useful information such as the open/closed status of individual lifts and slopes in real time, opening hours of the lifts, breaks, weather forecasts, points of interest such as ski schools, ski rentals, infopoints, Pick-up Box, as well as descriptions and contacts. 
The user will also find other interesting and popular functions, such as the Performance Check, Tracking option to record the route taken while skiing, Routing which will navigate you to a predetermined point on the slopes. By reaching certain goals with the "Tracking" function, the user will be assigned interesting Badges - a great way to challenge yourself! And finally, you get to play too since the registered members of the APP-community can also have fun with the APP's game functions, creating their network of friends, who must also be registered members and in possession of a Dolomiti Superski ski pass and challenging each other throughout the ski season.
Discover the new APP’s full potential watching the video tutorials.
